name: Poketale
summary: It's been 70 years since Frisk freed the monsters from Underground. However, the monsters are no longer the same: after an event in which a light illuminated all of Ebottia, all the weak monsters were transformed into Pokémon, causing society to have to adapt to the new creatures without intelligence and with powers beyond their control. all understanding. Can you discover the secret of transforming monsters into Pokémon and become the new Champion of Ebottia?
